meanings.sent1: My granddaddy tells the best stories.
meanings.sent2: I visited my granddaddy over the weekend.
meanings.sent3: My granddaddy always falls asleep in his favorite chair.
meanings.sent4: The old oak tree is the granddaddy of the forest.
meanings.sent5: Every Christmas, my granddaddy gives us all presents.

meanings.definition: Something that is the largest or most important of its kind.
meanings.sent1: Mount Everest is the granddaddy of all mountains.
meanings.sent2: The granddaddy of all cars is the classic red sports car.
meanings.sent3: The granddaddy of all cakes was too big to fit in the oven.
meanings.sent4: The granddaddy of all storms hit the town last night.
meanings.sent5: The granddaddy of all libraries had books from floor to ceiling.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is considered the best or most powerful in a particular group.
meanings.sent1: In the superhero team, Captain Marvel is the granddaddy.
meanings.sent2: The granddaddy of all desserts is the chocolate lava cake.
meanings.sent3: The granddaddy of all computers crashed during the presentation.
meanings.sent4: The granddaddy of all leaders inspired everyone with his speech.
meanings.sent5: The granddaddy of all athletes won the gold medal.
